news_stories.headline: Spy vs. Spy: Dig for On-Line Gold
news_stories.full_text: Time was when backgrounding a story subject wasn't for the fainthearted... Just get out there and dig.

news_stories.headline: Pushing the Bridge Limits
news_stories.full_text: It sounded like a no-brainer: 13-ton school buses crossing 3-, 4- and 5-ton bridges... A follow-up story is planned in a few months to see what, if any, changes are really made.

news_stories.headline: Pawnshops Draw Criminals
news_stories.full_text: Fort Lauderdale has the third worst property crime rate in the nation... If your police department does keep pawn slips and agrees to turn them over, make sure to ask if they are available electronically. It' ll save you a lot of work. Happy hunting.
